CustomField.formula: AND( NOT( SBQQ__Product__r.Shell__c ) , SBQQ__Product__r.IsActive , OR(SBQQ__ProductFamily__c = 'Complex',SBQQ__ProductFamily__c = 'Single Offices',SBQQ__ProductFamily__c = 'Mobile Offices',SBQQ__ProductFamily__c = 'Assembly Complex',SBQQ__ProductFamily__c = 'Classroom Complex',SBQQ__ProductFamily__c = 'Daycare Complex',SBQQ__ProductFamily__c = 'Lavatory Complex',SBQQ__ProductFamily__c = 'Medical Complex',SBQQ__ProductFamily__c = 'Office Complexes'))
CustomField.label: Is Unit
